column4: Latest; Phnom Penh: A group who came to visit a pagoda found a baby aged around a month old lying on the floor. The incident took place at 9:30 am on December 1
column5: 2019 at a wat in Sangkat Veal Vong
column7: Phnom Penh.------According to the woman who found the infant
column8: seven vehicles were traveling from Kampong Cham to visit the pagoda. When she went to the toilet
column9: she heard a baby crying and found it close by on the floor.------ Local law enforcement were informed and  ------ABC------ radio came to take the baby for medical care. Police are now searching for the mother. ------TDN
